pr_title: Pass GameMap instead of GameData for TerritoryAttachment methods

timeline.message:
Pass GameMap instead of GameData for TerritoryAttachment methods

The four static methods in TerritoryAttachment that are related with
capitals don't need the entire GameData. They only need the GameMap.

timeline.bodyText: These checks are redundant since setCapital doesn't allow unknown player names.  So ta.getCapital() will either return a null or will return a String that is a valid player name.
timeline.author: trevan

timeline.bodyText:
It's a bit amusing this is used almost 20 lines later.   : )
"Clean code" was written in 2008, this code almost certainly predates it. Interesting to see the concept of 'good code' evolve.
timeline.author: DanVanAtta
